content: this **eagle potholder** is worked in tapestry crochet using 2 strands of yarn you can also use the pattern to make blanket squares wall hangings bags etc the pdf file includes **written instructions** and **color charts** for both the bicolor and multicolor *with the colors of the usa flag* versions of the pattern **materials** sport 2 fine weight yarn 2 75-mm c/2 us 12 uk crochet hook tapestry needle **yarn** i used schachenmayr catania in the following colors **bicolor potholder** **a** coffee brown 162 52 yds / 47 5 m **b** natural white 130 30 yds / 27 5 m **multicolor potholder** **a** natural white 130 52 yds / 47 5 m **b** bordeaux red 425 5 8 yds / 5 3 m **c** grey 434 5 8 yds / 5 3 m **d** jeans blue 164 18 6 yds / 17 m **size** 6 3 16 cm by 6 3 16 cm **gauge** 27 5 single_crochet for 26 row in 4 10 cm worked in tapestry crochet **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
